title: Magi- Brookdale Christian Church, Bloomfield NJ
desc: Take a look inside Word of Life?s spectacular Christmas production ? Magi. Cast and crew from our Bible Institutes in New York and Florida travel throughout the US presenting the true meaning of Christmas through creative use of music, drama and multimedia. Through the partnership of? Brookdale Christian Church? and Word of life, the event will be held at Ocean City Tabernacle. ?For more information, please contact them at (973)338-8536 or by visiting their website at  www.brookdalechristian.com .
